verses.verse: וַיִּקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Chu took בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- the sons אַ֠הֲרֹן <S%H175><s%> 'A-ha-ron of Aaron נָדָ֨ב <S%H5070><s%> na-Dav And Nadab וַאֲבִיה֜וּא <S%H30><s%> va-'a-vi-Hu and Abihu אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish either מַחְתָּת֗וֹ <S%H4289><s%> mach-ta-To, of them his censer וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nu and put בָהֵן֙ <S%H2004><s%> va-Hen therein אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'Esh, fire וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> vai-ya-Si-mu and put עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha and קְטֹ֑רֶת <S%H7004><s%> ke-To-ret; incense וַיַּקְרִ֜בוּ <S%H7126><s%> vai-yak-Ri-vu thereon and offered לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh fire זָרָ֔ה <S%H2114><s%> za-Rah, strange אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹ֦א <S%H3808><s%> lo had not צִוָּ֖ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah which he commanded אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam.

וַתֵּ֥צֵא <S%H3318><s%> vat-Te-tze And there went out אֵ֛שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh fire מִלִּפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> mil-lif-Nei before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh from the LORD וַתֹּ֣אכַל <S%H398><s%> vat-To-chal and devoured אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam; וַיָּמֻ֖תוּ <S%H4191><s%> vai-ya-Mu-tu them and they died לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh Then Moses אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, unto Aaron הוּא֩ <S%H1931><s%> hu It אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- is what דִּבֶּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber spake יְהוָ֤ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh This [is it] that the LORD לֵאמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying בִּקְרֹבַ֣י <S%H7138><s%> bik-ro-Vai in them that come nigh אֶקָּדֵ֔שׁ <S%H6942><s%> 'ek-ka-Desh, I will be sanctified וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei me and before כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am all the people אֶכָּבֵ֑ד <S%H3513><s%> 'ek-ka-Ved; I will be glorified וַיִּדֹּ֖ם <S%H1826><s%> vai-yid-Dom held his peace אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron. And Aaron

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מִֽישָׁאֵל֙ <S%H4332><s%> mi-sha-'El Mishael וְאֶ֣ל <S%H413><s%> ve-'El and אֶלְצָפָ֔ן <S%H469><s%> 'el-tza-Fan, and Elzaphan בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons עֻזִּיאֵ֖ל <S%H5816><s%> 'uz-zi-'El of Uzziel דֹּ֣ד <S%H1730><s%> dod the uncle אַהֲרֹ֑ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron; of Aaron וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, to קִ֠רְב֞וּ <S%H7126><s%> kir-Vu unto them Come near שְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> se-'U carry אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲחֵיכֶם֙ <S%H251><s%> 'a-chei-Chem your brethren מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et פְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> pe-nei- from before הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh, the sanctuary אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> mi-Chutz out לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> Lam-ma-cha-Neh. of the camp

וַֽיִּקְרְב֗וּ <S%H7126><s%> vai-yik-re-Vu, So they went near וַיִּשָּׂאֻם֙ <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-sa-'Um and carried בְּכֻתֳּנֹתָ֔ם <S%H3801><s%> be-chut-to-no-Tam, them in their coats אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> mi-Chutz out לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> lam-ma-cha-Neh; of the camp כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber had said מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh. as Moses

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַהֲרֹ֡ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron unto Aaron וּלְאֶלְעָזָר֩ <S%H499><s%> u-le-'el-'a-Zar and unto Eleazar וּלְאִֽיתָמָ֨ר׀ <S%H385><s%> u-le-'i-ta-Mar and unto Ithamar בָּנָ֜יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav his sons רָֽאשֵׁיכֶ֥ם <S%H7218><s%> ra-shei-Chem not your heads אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּפְרָ֣עוּ׀ <S%H6544><s%> tif-Ra-'u Uncover וּבִגְדֵיכֶ֤ם <S%H899><s%> u-vig-dei-Chem your clothes לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor תִפְרֹ֙מוּ֙ <S%H6533><s%> tif-Ro-mu neither rend וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor תָמֻ֔תוּ <S%H4191><s%> ta-Mu-tu, lest ye die וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָעֵדָ֖ה <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah come upon all the people יִקְצֹ֑ף <S%H7107><s%> yik-Tzof; and lest wrath וַאֲחֵיכֶם֙ <S%H251><s%> va-'a-chei-Chem but let your brethren כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the whole house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel יִבְכּוּ֙ <S%H1058><s%> yiv-Ku bewail אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַשְּׂרֵפָ֔ה <S%H8316><s%> has-se-re-Fah, the burning אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which שָׂרַ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> sa-Raf hath kindled יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. which the LORD

וּמִפֶּתַח֩ <S%H6607><s%> u-mip-pe-Tach from the door אֹ֨הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֜ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed of the congregation לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo even תֵֽצְאוּ֙ <S%H3318><s%> te-tze-'U And ye shall not go out פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- or תָּמֻ֔תוּ <S%H4191><s%> ta-Mu-tu, lest ye die כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for שֶׁ֛מֶן <S%H8081><s%> She-men oil מִשְׁחַ֥ת <S%H4888><s%> mish-Chat for the anointing יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem; and וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Su [is] upon you And they did כִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> kid-Var according to the word מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh. of Moses פ Peh
וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, God אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

יַ֣יִן <S%H3196><s%> Ya-yin wine וְשֵׁכָ֞ר <S%H7941><s%> ve-she-Char nor strong drink אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nor תֵּ֣שְׁתְּ׀ <S%H8354><s%> Te-shet Do not drink אַתָּ֣ה׀ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nei-cha thou nor thy sons אִתָּ֗ךְ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tach, for בְּבֹאֲכֶ֛ם <S%H935><s%> be-vo-'a-Chem with thee when ye go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel into the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed of the congregation וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo you will not תָמֻ֑תוּ <S%H4191><s%> ta-Mu-tu; lest ye die חֻקַּ֥ת <S%H2708><s%> chuk-Kat [it shall be] a statute עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam for ever לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1755><s%> le-do-ro-tei-Chem. throughout your generations

וּֽלֲהַבְדִּ֔יל <S%H914><s%> u-la-hav-Dil, And that ye may put difference בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein between הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh between holy וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein and between הַחֹ֑ל <S%H2455><s%> ha-Chol; and unholy וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between הַטָּמֵ֖א <S%H2931><s%> hat-ta-Me and between unclean וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between הַטָּהֽוֹר׃ <S%H2889><s%> hat-ta-Hor. and clean

וּלְהוֹרֹ֖ת <S%H3384><s%> u-le-ho-Rot And that ye may teach אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַ֣חֻקִּ֔ים <S%H2706><s%> ha-chuk-Kim, all the statutes אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber hath spoken יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem to בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- unto them by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh. of Moses פ Peh

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, unto Aaron וְאֶ֣ל <S%H413><s%> ve-'El about אֶ֠לְעָזָר <S%H499><s%> 'El-'a-zor and unto Eleazar וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and אִ֨יתָמָ֥ר׀ <S%H385><s%> 'i-ta-Mar and unto Ithamar בָּנָיו֮ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav his sons הַנּֽוֹתָרִים֒ <S%H3498><s%> han-no-ta-Rim that were left קְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> ke-Chu Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּנְחָ֗ה <S%H4503><s%> ham-min-Chah, the meat offering הַנּוֹתֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H3498><s%> han-no-Te-ret that remaineth מֵאִשֵּׁ֣י <S%H801><s%> me-'ish-Shei made by fire יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD וְאִכְל֥וּהָ <S%H398><s%> ve-'ich-Lu-ha and eat מַצּ֖וֹת <S%H4682><s%> matz-Tzot it without leaven אֵ֣צֶל <S%H681><s%> 'E-tzel beside הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach; the altar כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh for it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> ka-da-Shim holy הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> hi You

וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֤ם <S%H398><s%> va-'a-chal-Tem And ye shall eat אֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah בְּמָק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> be-ma-Kom place קָדֹ֔שׁ <S%H6918><s%> ka-Dosh, it in the holy כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki because חָקְךָ֤ <S%H2706><s%> cha-ke-Cha because it [is] thy due וְחָק־ <S%H2706><s%> ve-chok- due בָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nei-cha and thy sons' הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he מֵאִשֵּׁ֖י <S%H801><s%> me-'ish-Shei made by fire יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because כֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> chen thus צֻוֵּֽיתִי׃ <S%H6680><s%> tzuv-Vei-ti. for so I am commanded

וְאֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חֲזֵ֨ה <S%H2373><s%> cha-Zeh breast הַתְּנוּפָ֜ה <S%H8573><s%> hat-te-nu-Fah And the wave וְאֵ֣ת׀ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שׁ֣וֹק <S%H7785><s%> Shok shoulder הַתְּרוּמָ֗ה <S%H8641><s%> hat-te-ru-Mah, and heave תֹּֽאכְלוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> to-che-Lu shall ye eat בְּמָק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> be-ma-Kom place טָה֔וֹר <S%H2889><s%> ta-Hor, in a clean אַתָּ֕ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וּבָנֶ֥יךָ <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nei-cha thou and thy sons וּבְנֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-no-Tei-cha and thy daughters אִתָּ֑ךְ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tach; for כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- as חָקְךָ֤ <S%H2706><s%> cha-ke-Cha with thee for [they be] thy due וְחָק־ <S%H2706><s%> ve-chok- due בָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nei-cha and thy sons' נִתְּנ֔וּ <S%H5414><s%> nit-te-Nu, [which] are given מִזִּבְחֵ֥י <S%H2077><s%> miz-ziv-Chei out of the sacrifices שַׁלְמֵ֖י <S%H8002><s%> shal-Mei of peace offerings בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

שׁ֣וֹק <S%H7785><s%> Shok shoulder הַתְּרוּמָ֞ה <S%H8641><s%> hat-te-ru-Mah The heave וַחֲזֵ֣ה <S%H2373><s%> va-cha-Zeh breast הַתְּנוּפָ֗ה <S%H8573><s%> hat-te-nu-Fah, and the wave עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al along אִשֵּׁ֤י <S%H801><s%> 'ish-Shei with the offerings made by fire הַחֲלָבִים֙ <S%H2459><s%> ha-cha-la-Vim of the fat יָבִ֔יאוּ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vi-'u, shall they bring לְהָנִ֥יף <S%H5130><s%> le-ha-Nif to wave תְּנוּפָ֖ה <S%H8573><s%> te-nu-Fah [it for] a wave offering לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD וְהָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become לְךָ֜ le-Cha וּלְבָנֶ֤יךָ <S%H1121><s%> u-le-va-Nei-cha and it shall be thine and thy sons' אִתְּךָ֙ <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Cha for לְחָק־ <S%H2706><s%> le-chok- with thee by a statute עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam, for ever כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah hath commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. as the LORD
